Personalise healthcare info and medical communications with AI

Enables pharma, healthcare, insurance and medical device companies with hyper-personalised and localised communications with our LLM models

Get Started Explore products

Use Cases

A co-pilot to generate regulatory compliant and factually correct medical data

Create hyper-personalised medical information for hospitals, HCPs and patients with FlocCare's in-house LLM's

1

Hyper-personalize
B2C and B2B2C
outreach

Use the power of generative AI to create content that your
consumers, patients or potential users will connect with. Our model works on:

  1. Multiple SEA and JAPAC languages
  2. Multiple social media channels
  3. Trained on your product and healthcare sector
  4. Trained on regulatory requirements
2

Latest Medical
Innovation
outreach to
clinicians and
hospitals

Train clinicians and hospitals on latest medical
innovations across medical devices,pharma,clinical
trial and more.Our model can generate & customise:

  • Images with your medical device
  • Workshops,educational info
  • Preference for the target consumer
  • Trained on regulatory requirements
3

Engage your
consumers with
information they will
appreciate

Create highly personalized content at scale in just 60 seconds
to reach out to your customers,bringing them right info at the
right time

  1. Be ready with content 30 days in advance
  2. Use prompts from our AI to generate thematic content
  3. Use the power of LLMs built with clinicians , marketers and AI experts
  4. Trained on regulatory requirements
Features

Customised solutions to help your healthcare goals, in 60 seconds.

Our gen AI engine creates informative healthcare content to educate and engage healthcare consumers.

Demographic Personalisation

Build healthcare content suitable for different location, language, persona, age and more

Regulatory Compliance

Get an AI generated copy that is compliant for your product class and location

For B2B and B2B2C

Generate content for HCP education, patient education, public health awareness and more

50X Faster

Leverage gen AI for super fast content creation

20X Cost Effective

Train AI model once, generate content every 60 seconds.

Fact Checked

Gen AI models and content sample checked by our panel of clinicians.

Plug & Play

Custom train your AI model in few clicks

Security at Each Step

Standardised and tested against security standards.
